servinfo.title: Accelerator Pedal Position (APP) Sensor Assembly Removal and Installation

item.ptxt: Do not expose accelerator pedal position (APP) sensor assembly to excessive shock like a dropping it. If accelerator pedal position (APP) sensor assembly has been exposed to excessive shock, it should be replaced.
Be careful not to expose sensor section of accelerator pedal position (APP) sensor assembly to water.

attention3.ptxt: After replacing accelerator pedal position (APP) sensor assembly, perform calibration of throttle valve referring to Electric Throttle Body System Calibration .

s1.ptxt: Disconnect connector from accelerator pedal position (APP) sensor assembly.
Remove accelerator pedal position (APP) sensor assembly from its bracket.

servinfosub.title: Installation

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Accelerator Pedal Position (APP) Sensor Assembly Inspection

servinfosub.ptxt: Reverse removal procedure for installation noting the following.

item.ptxt: Tighten accelerator pedal position (APP) sensor assembly upper nut (1) first and then lower nuts (2) to specified torque.

torqueitem.t-part: Accelerator pedal position (APP) sensor assembly nut

item.ptxt: If APP sensor assembly bracket is removed, tighten its mounting nuts to specified torque
Connect connector to accelerator pedal position (APP) sensor assembly securely.
